Heptachlor epoxide.Definition: Organic Compound;Pesticide;Organochloride; Heptachlor epoxide is a chemical produced when heptachlor is broken down by bacteria and animals. Heptachlor is a manufactured cyclodiene organochlorine insecticide. As it is a persistant organic pollutant, heptachlor use is banned or limited in most areas. The epoxide is more likely to be found in the environment than heptachlor.
